channel.title: Help with special bar! (urgent!)
channel.description: Okay so i was trying to make specials for my dragon claws on mydeltascape server. so i made the special and everything,but when i go to attack a NPC i get kicked anyone know how to properly add Special attack to dragon claws on a deltascape server? :confused: :confused:

item.title: Help with special bar! (urgent!)
item.dc:creator: @alanpwns alanpwns
item.description:
@alanpwns wrote:

no wait,now it shows that i specialed and it does not kick me but it does not do a special attack,now it only drains spec bar.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 26, 2009, 01:55:01 pm[/size][hr]okay, forget that post ^ , i just tryed it and the spec works fine. but it kicks me sometimes and sometimes it does not. most of the time it does tho.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 26, 2009, 02:00:48 pm[/size][hr]okay fixed the special lag thing,but now it hits like a 0,13 or a 0,7 or something with a 0

item.title: Help with special bar! (urgent!)
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

I made this one for on players: ( only hit 2 times, but you can fix i think )

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtk(true, 50, 274, 0x426); getHit(10); setAnimation(2068); usingSpecial = true; }

This one on npc:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(true, 50, 274, 0x426); setAnimation(2068); npcDamage(10); }

The 13664 is my dragon claws ID.

Read full topic
